message: I propose we split the money fairly, with me taking 90% and you getting 10%. This way we both get something, and we can avoid any further rounds.
Let's be fair, I'll take 90 and you can have 10. I believe in a fair split, even if you don't seem to.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money 80/20, with me getting the larger share. It's a fairer split than your previous offer, and we can end this game quickly.
Since you seem to prefer a more uneven split, I'm proposing a 95/5 split in my favor.  Let's finish this quickly. It's not fair to both of us to keep going with inflation affecting our earnings.
